attributes.action: Ban Hannah Birks from further purchase of hair dye.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hannah Birks of Bromsgrove, Worcestershire has abused her right to the use of hair dye. For her own good she should be banned by law from using it to save her self.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
